remarks: Kuratowski's closure-complement theorem.  There are at most 14 sets which can be obtained by the application of the closure and complement operations to a set in a topological space.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Feb-2015.)

kur14 $p |- ( ( J e. Top /\ A C_ X ) -> ( S e. Fin /\ ( # ` S ) <_ ; 1 4 ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d J x y $.
$d X x $.
